raw_mentions: However, experiments were realized in acellular in vitro assay and the IC50 of Stx1 was shifted by one order of magnitude in presence of 0.8 mM 4-APP.

Here are the extracted sentences with concrete data points that meet the specified criteria:


HeLa-cells over-expressing MPR-GFP were pretreated with 20 μM of compounds 193 or 161 for 30 min at 37° C.
HeLa-cells were treated for 5.5 h at 37° C. with 20 μM of compounds 193 or 161 (FIGS. 10B and 10C).
Concentrations of up to 100 μM of compounds did not cause any reduction in the overall protein biosynthesis.
By using immunofluorescence, THP1-cells were incubated with 100 μM of compound for 30 min at 37° C., before binding of StxB on ice for 30 min and internalization for 45 nm at 37° C.
On THP-1-cells, compounds 161 and 193 concentrations as high as 100 μM did not cause any apparent side effects.
